Trade/Device Name(s): Healgen THC One Step Marijuana Test
Healgen mAMP One Step Methamphetamine Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Healgen THC and mAMP One Step tests for qualitative detection of marijuana metabolite and methamphetamine in urine using immunochromatographic lateral flow technology
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of 11-nor-Δ9-THC-9-COOH and methamphetamine in human urine at specified cut-off concentrations, intended for in vitro diagnostic, over-the-counter and prescription use in strip, cassette, dip card, and cup formats
